data.introduce: 该接口主要用于获取客票控制权使用，客票控制权，对应黑屏指令：DETR:TN/票号，C#。
data.business: 该接口只针对国内航司票本使用。
data.functions: 【DETR:TN/票号，C#】指令是国内票本获取控制权指令，外航票本无法使用。如代理人有外航票本的AIRPORT CONTROL航段需要调整至OPEN，需联系票本航司操作。另外，如国内票本使用该指令无法将机场控制状态调整至open状态，请DETR:TN/票号，H查看是否有O/A 外航航司代码的操作记录，如有，也请外航航司操作。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketControlRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票控制权获取请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketControlInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TicketNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"CouponNos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票联号列表","children":[{"name":"CouponNo","type":"int","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"票联号（从1开始）","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketControlRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票控制权获取返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"调用返回结果。OK表示成功","children":[]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":-303,"name":"","msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":-304,"name":"","msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":-305,"name":"","msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":-301,"name":"","msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":-390,"name":"","msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":-311,"name":"","msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":-306,"name":"","msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":-1,"name":"","msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]
